source:
class IntuneAADPackage(BaseOEAModule):
    # Defines the intune data processing module.
    def __init__(self, oea, source_folder='m365'):

        BaseOEAModule.__init__(self, oea, source_folder)
        
        self.stage1np_intune = self.stage1np + '/intune/devices'
        self.stage1np_aad = self.stage1np + '/AzureAD'

        self.schemas['Intune_Devices'] =   [['DeviceName', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                    ['ManagedBy', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                    ['Ownership', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                    ['Compliance','string','no-op'],
                                    ['OS', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                    ['OSVersion', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                    ['LastCheckIn', 'timestamp', 'no-op'],
                                    ['PrimaryUserUPN', 'string', 'hash'],
                                    ['DeviceID', 'string', 'hash']]
        self.schemas['AAD_Devices'] =  [['accountEnabled','string','no-op'],
                                        ['approximateLastLogonTimeStamp','string','no-op'],
                                        ['deviceId','string','hash'],
                                        ['deviceOSType','string','no-op'],
                                        ['deviceOSVersion','string','no-op'],
                                        ['deviceTrustType','string','no-op'],
                                        ['dirSyncEnabled','string','no-op'],
                                        ['displayName','string','no-op'],
                                        ['isCompliant','string','no-op'],
                                        ['isManaged','string','no-op'],
                                        ['lastDirSyncTime','string','no-op'],
                                        ['objectId','string','hash'],
                                        ['profileType','string','no-op'],
                                        ['registeredOwners','string','no-op'],
                                        ['systemLabels','string','no-op'],
                                        ['registrationTime','string','no-op'],
                                        ['mdmDisplayName','string','no-op']]

        self.schemas['AAD_Users'] = [['userPrincipalName', 'string', 'hash'],
                                        ['displayNamesurname', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['mail', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['givenName', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['id', 'string', 'hash'],
                                        ['userType', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['jobTitle', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['department', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['accountEnabled', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['usageLocation', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['streetAddress', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['state', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['country', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['officeLocation', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['city', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['postalCode', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['telephoneNumber', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['mobilePhone', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['alternateEmailAddress', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['ageGroup', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['consentProvidedForMinor', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['legalAgeGroupClassification', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['companyName', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['creationType', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['directorySynced', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['invitationState', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['identityIssuer', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['createdDateTime', 'string','no-op']]

    def process_devices_data_from_stage1(self):
        logger.info("Processing intune reports data from: " + self.stage1np)
        spark_schema = self.oea.to_spark_schema(self.schemas['Intune_Devices'])
        df = spark.read.csv(self.stage1np_intune + '/*.csv', header='true', schema=spark_schema)
        df = df.dropDuplicates(['DeviceID'])
        df.write.parquet(self.stage2np + '/Intunes/Devices/devices.parquet', mode='overwrite')
        
        logger.info("Processing Azure AD Device data from: " + self.stage1np)
        spark_schema = self.oea.to_spark_schema(self.schemas['AAD_Devices'])
        df = spark.read.csv(self.stage1np_aad + '/*.csv', header='true', schema=spark_schema)
        df = df.dropDuplicates(['deviceId'])
        df.write.parquet(self.stage2np + '/AzureAD/devices.parquet', mode='overwrite')

    def process_devices_data_from_stage2(self):
        intune_spark_schema = self.oea.to_spark_schema(self.schemas['Intune_Devices'])
        df = spark.read.parquet(self.stage2np + '/Intunes/Devices/*.parquet', header='true', schema=spark_schema)
        #sqlContext.registerDataFrameAsTable(spark.read.format('parquet').load(oea.stage2np + '/m365/Intunes/*'), 'Devices')
        #df = spark.sql("select DeviceID,PrimaryUserUPN,LastCheckIn,OSVersion,OS,Ownership,ManagedBy,DeviceName from Devices")
        df.write.format('parquet').mode('overwrite').save(self.stage2np + '/m365/Intunes/Devices')

spark.sql('CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS s2_intune_aad')
spark.sql("create table if not exists s2_intune_aad.intune_devices using PARQUET location '"+self.stage2np + "/Intunes/Devices/devices.parquet'")
